node.statement: Write E_gamma(rho(t)||tau(t)) = Tr(rho(t) - gamma tau(t))_+. Let A(t) = rho(t) - gamma tau(t). By spectral decomposition A(t) = sum_i lambda_i(t) |e_i(t)><e_i(t)|, and A(t)_+ = sum_{lambda_i>0} lambda_i(t) |e_i(t)><e_i(t)| = P_gamma(t) A(t) P_gamma(t) where P_gamma(t) = 1{A(t) > 0}.
